english.segment1: The corporate beast has got me. I've fallen in the trap. This beast it feeds on me. I'm never coming back.
english.segment2: You've sucked the truth out of me. Abolished honesty. I can't escape, it's got me. Independence dying slowly.
english.segment3: Welcome to the Machine. Welcome to the Machine. It's eating me alive. Welcome to the Machine. Welcome to the Machine. Sell out your life or die.
english.segment4: In pursuit of your polished altars, you dream in presidents. Sell your god, sell your faith, and market prices rising fast.
english.segment5: I never asked for this. My intentions were pure. I never meant to enlist in the corporate music war.
english.segment6: Welcome to the Machine. Welcome to the Machine. It's eating me alive. Welcome to the Machine. Welcome to the Machine. Sell out your life or die.
english.segment7: Your world is painted mint green. You believe green is everything.
english.segment8: This machine has taken me away. This machine has got me.
english.segment9: The corporate beast has got me. I've fallen in the trap. This beast it feeds on me. I'm never coming back.
english.segment10: Welcome to the Machine. Welcome to the Machine. It's eating me alive. Welcome to the Machine. Welcome to the Machine. Sell out your life or die.
